Document.TEXT: 2011 (11) - BMW 5 Series 520d SE 4dr FULL LEATHER & BLUETOOTH £12,000 Loading Images... (Cornering brake control), Check control system, Chrome kidney grille with black vertical slats, Crash Sensor - activates hazard/interior lighting + unlocks doors, Cruise control with brake function, Diesel particulate filter, Driver/front passenger side airbags, Driver/Passenger airbags (Impact dependent), Dynamic brake control, Dynamic stability control plus, Dynamic Traction Control - DTC, Electric + heated aspheric door mirrors, Electric front and rear windows with fingertip open/close + anti-trap all round, Electromechanical parking brake, Engine immobiliser, Fogging sensor for front windscreen, Front centre armrest, Front cupholders x 2, Front fog lights, Front footwell lights, Front head restraints with anti-whiplash, Front passenger airbag deactivation, Front/rear courtesy lights with soft on/off dimming, Front/rear Parking distance control, Front/rear reading lights, Fuel cut off safety device, Green tinted heat insulating glass, Headlight range control-electric, Heated front seats, Heated windscreen washer jets, Hill start assist, iDrive Controller and Display with 7'' monitor, Illuminated glovebox with lock, Inertia reel front seatbelts+pretensioners, Isofix rear child seat preparation, Keyless ignition, Locking wheel bolts, Luggage compartment release button in drivers A pillar, Luggage compartment with electric unlock Exact specification may vary from the details on this page. Please contact the seller via our email dealer form or on 01634 624419 to reconfirm any details before purchasing. See terms & conditions for further info.
